pageContext.other: Castleacre is now called Castle Acre. The full title of the Publication is "Bronze Age Metalwork in Norwich Museum". The drawing shows Length 90, Edge 77, but it is not written in the front of the card. Might say 10% something (tin?) in Composition. In Collection, it says "FROM WATER-COLOUR DRAWING... ". It also seems to have been struck through and another item is referenced (Castleacre 22.08(1)), I'd better leave this one for you experts to sort out.
pageContext.collection: LOCATION UNKNOWN,d, FROM WATER-COLOUR DRAWING IN BULMER COLLECTION, NORWICH CASTLE MUSEUM. SCALE PRESUMED 1/1, Actually Castleacre 22.08 (1)
pageContext.remarks: See drawing of object from Castleacre, 27
